title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 inconsistency regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: The bug report highlights an inconsistency in Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 regarding the effect of a custom cookie name on URL rewriting.
OB: The current behavior is inconsistent with the statement in Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1. The Reload link generates a URL with the default 'jsessionid' instead of the expected custom cookie name.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Reload link to generate a URL using the custom cookie name 'MYSESSIONCOOKIE' for URL rewriting.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file. 2. Access the URL 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
